devdoc.details: Any functions dealing with initial deposits will take an address (because no ID has been assigned). After a user has deposited, all functions dealing with deposits (like withdraw or redeem functions) will take the ID of the deposit. All functions that return aggregated data grouped by user will take an address (iterates across all relevant IDs).

params.amount_: Amount of new gOHM debt issued from donor to recipient
params.depositId_: Deposit ID to direct additional gOHM to

params.amount_: Amount of new sOHM debt issued from donor to recipient
params.depositId_: Deposit ID to direct additional gOHM to

params.amount_: Amount of gOHM debt issued from donor to recipient
params.recipient_: Address to direct staking yield and vault shares to

params.amount_: Amount of sOHM debt issued from donor to recipient
params.recipient_: Address to direct staking yield and vault shares to
Address of user receiving donated yield
Address of user recieiving donated yield
Address of user receiving donated yield

params.amount_: Amount of gOHM deposit to remove and return to donor
params.depositId_: Deposit ID to remove gOHM deposit from

params.amount_: Amount of gOHM debt to remove and return to donor as sOHM
params.depositId_: Deposit ID to remove gOHM debt from

devdoc.title: YieldDirector (codename Tyche)

addToDeposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit additional gOHM, and update deposit record

addToSohmDeposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit additional sOHM, wrap to gOHM, and update deposit record

deposit(uint256,address).notice: Deposit gOHM, records sender address and assign rebases to recipient

depositSohm(uint256,address).notice: Deposit sOHM, wrap to gOHM, and records sender address and assign rebases to recipeint

depositsTo(address,address).notice: Get deposited gOHM amounts for specific recipient (updated to current index based on sOHM equivalent amount deposit)

donatedTo(address,address).notice: Return total amount of gOHM donated to recipient since last full redemption

getAllDeposits(address).notice: Return arrays of donor's recipients and deposit amounts (gOHM value based on sOHM equivalent deposit), matched by index

getDepositorIds(address).notice: Returns the array of deposit id's belonging to the depositor

getRecipientIds(address).notice: Getter function for a recipient's list of IDs. This is needed for the frontend as public state variables that map to arrays only return one element at a time rather than the full array

givePermissionToRedeem(address).notice: Gives a contract permission to redeem yield on behalf of users

redeemAllYield().notice: Redeem recipient's full donated amount of sOHM at current index as gOHM

redeemAllYieldAsSohm().notice: Redeem recipient's full donated amount of sOHM at current index as gOHM

redeemAllYieldOnBehalfOf(address).notice: Redeems all yield tied to a recipient and sends it to the recipient

redeemYield(uint256).notice: Redeem recipient's donated amount of sOHM at current index from one donor as gOHM

redeemYieldAsSohm(uint256).notice: Redeem recipient's donated amount of sOHM at current index

redeemYieldOnBehalfOf(uint256).notice: Redeems yield from a deposit and sends it to the recipient

redeemableBalance(uint256).notice: Get redeemable gOHM balance of a specific deposit

revokePermissionToRedeem(address).notice: Revokes a contract permission to redeem yield on behalf of users

totalDeposits(address).notice: Return total amount of donor's gOHM deposited (updated to current index based on sOHM equivalent amount deposited)

totalDonated(address).notice: Return total amount of gOHM donated from donor since last full redemption

totalRedeemableBalance(address).notice: Get redeemable gOHM balance of a recipient address

withdrawAll().notice: Withdraw all gOHM from all donor positions

withdrawPrincipalAsSohm(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw donor's gOHM from vault, and return it as sOHM

userdoc.notice: This contract allows donors to deposit their gOHM and donate their rebases to any address. Donors will be able to withdraw the sOHM equivalent of their principal gOHM at any time. Donation recipients can also redeem accrued rebases at any time.
